title: Dexter Langen
text:
Dexter Langen (born 6 December 1980 in <a href="Friedberg%2C%20Hesse">Friedberg, Hesse</a>) is a German former <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28football%29">defender</a>. As of December 2014, he is training to be a nursery teacher.
Career.
On 15 December 2008, he was released with teammate <a href="%C4%90or%C4%91ije%20%C4%86etkovi%C4%87">Đorđije Ćetković</a> from <a href="Hansa%20Rostock">Hansa Rostock</a> and was demoted to reserve team, on 9 March 2009 he was reprieved and trained with the first team.
